user1.name: Student Zhang
user1.comment: Used CodePass to complete my graduation thesis, it's really great! Not only saved a lot of time, but also high quality.

user2.name: Professor Li
user2.comment: As a supervisor, I appreciate this tool's emphasis on academic integrity, helping students better complete academic writing.

q1.question: Does CodePass meet academic integrity requirements?
q1.answer: Yes, we strictly follow academic integrity principles, providing transparent AI assistance tools to help students improve writing quality rather than replace thinking.

q2.question: Can the generated content pass AI detection?
q2.answer: Our system is specially optimized, and the generated content has a natural human style that can pass mainstream AI detection tools.

q3.question: What subject areas are supported?
q3.answer: Currently supports multiple subject areas including liberal arts, science, engineering, including but not limited to computer science, economics, literature, etc.

aiGuide.description: AI tutor based on personal knowledge documents, mind maps, translation, summaries, focusing on document learning, making knowledge learning and management easy and simple.

smartWriting.title: Smart Writing:
smartWriting.description: Complete proposals in minutes with standardized formats and professional content. Over 100 writing application templates, supporting personalized writing based on personal knowledge base, AI revolutionizes copywriting.

verification.title: Verification:
verification.description: Achieve networked search and personal knowledge base search, meeting various scenarios' knowledge acquisition and data retrieval needs, ensuring AI response accuracy and personalization.

dataGuide.title: Data Guide:
dataGuide.description: Automatically capture daily key news content, AI summary + copywriting, support one-click addition to personal knowledge base, personalized excerpts based on knowledge base, ensuring you don't miss any valuable information.

team.title: Our Team
